Disease.Name: CYSTINOSIS, ADULT NONNEPHROPATHIC
Disease.Summary: test;rare(1:100000);autosomal recessive;3 different types:;- infantile nephropathic (219800) -> most frequent form;- adult nonnephropathic (219750);nephropathic cystinosis:;- early onset: 6-18 months;- late onset: 4-26 years;nonnnephropathic cystinosis:;- late onset, adult, benign

symtomp.symptom: photophobia or photosensitive defect in light-exposed area

literature.title: Ocular nonnephropathic cystinosis: clinical, biochemical, and molecular correlations
literature.author: Anikster Y;
